title: Sarakka Lyrics Maalai Nerathu Mayakkam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Maalai Nerathu Mayakkam Sarakka Song Lyrics
Singer: Amrit
Music: Amrit
Lyrics : Vivek, Amrit

Sarakka konjam irakki
avala marakka paakkuren.
yaarum illaa kadayil
yen naan tea-ya aathuren

en manasa
puyal pol alichu
en nee usuppa yethura

kaaththaadi
polirukka venum
romba sugamaa.
summa irundha enna
yen kattivacha engamma.

arranged marriage
romba romba galeeju.
manoja saroja
thevayilla yenakku

Sarakka konjam irakki
avala marakka paakkuren.
yaarum illaa kadayil
yen naan tea-ya aathuren

thaththalikkum
meenapola pithupudichu
naan vaththi ponen.

verumilla
veraarumilla thani
maramaa ingae
naan nikkureney.

nee nadamaadum
aappu kada
unnaalathaan
pochu vadai.

yen heartula
otta poata.
ippa aayitaen
fullaa matta.

matrimoney sitekula
matter onnum illa illa.

arranged
arranged marriage
romba romba galeeju.
manoja saroja
thevayilla yenakku.

Punpaduthum jenmamadaa
munjamin vangi
usaar aavudaa.

oru maalai nerathu
mayakkathinaal
saagumvarai
marana thandanayaa

yen vazhkayila
aadiputtaa
idhu IPL
tournamentaa

ull kaaya paduthiputtaa
sandhi sirikkathaan
vachchiputtaa

jaadhakaththa
parthu parthu
araajagam panraalunga

arranged
arranged marriage
romba romba galeeju.
manoja saroja
thevayilla unakku.

Sarakka konjam irakki
avala marakka paakkuren.
yaarum illaa kadayil
yen naan tea-ya aathuren

en manasa
puyal pol alichu
en nee usuppa yethura

kaaththaadi
polirukka venum
romba sugamaa.
summa irundha enna
yen kattivacha engamma.

arranged marriage
romba romba galeeju.
manoja saroja
thevayilla yenakku
